tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE products (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), expiration_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE alerts (id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_id INT, alert_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE alerts_log (id INT PRIMARY KEY, alert_id INT, alert_sent BOOLEAN);
CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), email VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE alert_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_id INT REFERENCES alerts(alert_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT
);
